body.name: Kitchen Knife Set with Block, Food Grade 15 Pcs German Stainless Steel Professional Chef Knife Set with Knife Sharpener, Full Tang Knife Block Set, Gift Box
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 37 mins
features: A SPECIAL GIFT: BRODARK was born for everyone loving life. Our knife set is more like a perfect companion for any cook to make a delicious meal for their families. For the one you cared about, BRODARK kitchen knife set, a good wish, must be gifted on mother's day, father's day, wedding, birthday, housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and any other events.

SUPER SHARP: BRODARK kitchen knives are made of premium high-carbon German stainless steel, V-shaped cutting edge knives, only 14-degree blade edge per side, which gives its blades a sharper edge. 55±2 Rockwell hardness provides doubles the edge retention. 14.82% CR protective film is more rust-proof and has a longer service life.

D-SHAPED ERGONOMIC HANDLE: Our chef knife set is made of premium PakkaWood handle. This handle not only exudes elegance but also ensures excellent corrosion resistance and durability. Designed to fit your palm perfectly, it provides optimal grip and comfort during use. Full tang construction offers the knives their impressive balance.

PERFECT CHEF KNIFE SET: The 2-stage knife sharpener keep your knives hold a sharp edge. 1x 8.5in chef knife, 1x 8in slicing knife, 1x 8in bread knife, 1x 7in santoku knife, 1x 5in utility knife, 1x3.5in paring knife, 1x kitchen shears, 6 pcs 4.5in serrated steak knife and hardwood knife block makes all kitchen tasks easily.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Hand-polished by craftsmen with 38 years of experience. The perfect blade, the perfect handle, the perfect knife block. Our knife block set has obtained patents and certifications issued by FDA, EU, FISO9001, BSCI, FSC, etc. BRODARK provides customers a 90-day refund policy, free replacement, and lifetime guarantee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: These knives are very sharp and very well made. I bought them for my best friends as a Christmas gift and I was unsure of the quality, not seeing them first hand. After seeing the product I can certainly say that they are well crafted with a full tang and wooden handles. The sharpeners built into the wooden block count as one part of the 15 piece set. I would buy this set again and I’m considering purchasing it for myself. They are very happy, and I’m super happy about that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice set. Works good.
reviews.reviewText: We needed a new knife set and this one seemed to be just what we were looking for. Steak knives are great and sharpers keeps a good edge on the cutting knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can't say enough about this product.Sharp (old lady has cut her self several times, do to her being used to inferior knifes 🔪. ) So I do most of the cooking 🍳 now. Which I really like doing anyway. She is also not allowed to wash them or pile them in the sink. I wash what she uses while I'm at work, when I get home. The looks of these are also awesome. Give you the feeling of being a chef 👩‍🍳. Thay make preparations for dinner so easy and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good blade quality, good cost-benefit
reviews.reviewText: The knives are exactly as advertised, the blades are of good quality, look good and are sharp enough for 95% of cooks out there. I like that it has an embedded sharpener. I paid about $90 on Cyber Monday for these knives and I’m really happy with them. But be aware that, for the original price of $220, I think you can find better options like Henckles or Cusinart.Pros: good price and good quality for a day-to-day set of knives for your kitchen. $80 is what I usually spend on a single knife that I use for cooking on special occasions, so this set is a great price and good enough quality for the daily grind;Cons: maybe some people don’t care about this and, considering the $90 price for the whole set, I shouldn’t either. But the material of the handle shows inconsistent shades throughout the set, with one of the knives (slicing knife) showing a clear defect on the surface finish (my photo shows some light-colored veins on its wood handle). If you’re going to pay over $200 for a set, I would expect it to have a beautiful and consistent surface finish on all of the pieces. Again, it’s not a build quality issue, it’s a cosmetic flaw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent knives at an excellent price
reviews.reviewText: I bought these knives as a present for my Father-in-law. I was hoping to find another young knife company with high quality products before everyone realized just how great they are and their prices reflect that quality, just like I did when I bought all my Dalstrong knives years ago. Well, I chose well. These are quality knives. The steel takes and holds an edge and does not corrode. The tang does in fact go all the way through the handles. The finish is beautiful and is resilient to washing. AND, I am a little jealous that these knives are better (perfectly) balanced than my old Dalstrong Gladiators. Six months in, he is happy, so my wife is happy, so I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE...and awesome knives
reviews.reviewText: The knife set is awesome and customer service is excellent!The knives are very well made. the weight is great, and they are very well balanced. They feel good in the hand and make using extremely comfortable. The handles are made of wood and the blades are sharp- very sharp.We did have an issue with one knife in which the handle started to split but I reached out to Brodark customer service and received a response right away. They sent a replacement set even though I needed just one knife replaced. AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! I believe the one knife handle issue is not typical because we have not had any other issues with the entire set and we use these every day.As with all quality knives, handwash only. We handwash them and dry them right away and they continue to be in perfect condition.As for sharpness and just to compare, we had a set of Henckel knives and after a month of use we were constantly having to sharpen them. The Henckels had rust starting to appear after a year of use, even with handwashing and drying so we were looking to replace them. I found these and decided to give them a go and so far they have not had to be sharpened, no rust has appeared, and they remain in new condition even after heavy use. I appreciate Broadark standing behind their knives and craftsmanship and I certainly recommend these knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent knife set for the house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very sharp and an incredible value. I do have only on complaint, the block is wood with a layer of paint or stain. It scratches really easy. the knives look great and work fantastic
